Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 7:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind light except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind light except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
